code: @Test public void testScriptResource() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedBodiesReceived(7).     template.sendBody("direct:start", 3).     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").transform().javaScript("resource:classpath:myjavascript.js").to("mock:result").         }     }. }
